title: The Quadratic Formula: Finding x-Intercepts
topic_summary: Explain the quadratic formula, its parts, and how to solve a quadratic equation with a concrete example, then connect the solutions to parabola x-intercepts.
target_audience: High school algebra students encountering this for the first time

scenes.title: Hook: Where Does the Parabola Cross?
scenes.narration_summary: Show a parabola and the question of x-intercepts; introduce need for a formula.

scenes.title: The Quadratic Formula
scenes.narration_summary: Present the quadratic formula visually and link it to ax^2 + bx + c = 0.

scenes.title: What Each Part Means
scenes.narration_summary: Define a, b, c; explain discriminant and Â± symbol as two solutions.

scenes.title: Worked Example
scenes.narration_summary: Solve x^2 - 5x + 6 = 0 step-by-step, compute discriminant, find both roots, verify.

scenes.title: Graph and Intercepts
scenes.narration_summary: Show parabola with x-intercepts at the two roots and close the lesson.
